title: The Favorites - NFL Week 8 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 8 Best Bets
description:
Professional gambler Simon Hunter issued a BETTING RED ALERT on Tuesday, urging gamblers to bet the underdog Indianapolis Colts at home. The line has now flipped, the Colts are now favored, and professional money is pouring in towards Indianapolis. So now, along with host Chad Millman of the Action Network, Simon gives out even more bets he's eyeing this week, including the Jaguars, Saints, Panthers and more all likely to make his card on Sunday. Plus, the gang discusses why now is the time to hammer the Vikings at home, and select their final survivor pool selection.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
